name: Hana's Projects
body:
### A little about me:
I'm a physical geographer trained in geospatial analysis and data visualization. I'm always eager to learn new skills and hone existing ones through projects that address real-world problems. 

Iâ€™ve always had an interest in solving puzzles. Growing up, my favorite pastimes were reading murder mystery novels and deciphering brain teasers. I enjoy finding answers to problems but I also relish the problem-solving process, which refines my skills, builds my knowledge and helps me grow both personally and professionally.

Check out some of my completed and on-going projects below.



### Data Analysis, Visualization and Machine Learning
To view a sample of my work with python and R check out my github repositories @hanakhan

![Iris Pairplot](https://s22.postimg.org/4lilor1nl/iris_pairplot.png)
[![Iris KMeans Clustering](https://s16.postimg.org/qpl8j7k6d/iris_kmeans.png)](https://postimg.org/image/u97690mw1/)
[![Titanic Correlations Heat Map](https://s16.postimg.org/ifz4cdrvp/titanic_corrmap.png)](https://postimg.org/image/uulwcpjdt/)

### Conference Posters
Visualizations and analysis for these projects were carried out using NCL.
